Actions.Name: Confirm all
Actions.Description: This method confirms all unhandled alerts your team currently has.

Actions.Name: Trigger Alert
Actions.Description: Triggers a new alert for your team. All team members on duty will receive alert notifications.

Actions.Name: Get Alert Report
Actions.Description: Returns information about the occurred alert volume in different time periods as well as information about the response behavior (amount of confirmed and unhandled alerts) of your team members.

Actions.Name: Get all Users
Actions.Description: Returns a list of user objects with details such as their email address. Only users who are part of your team will be returned.

Actions.Name: Get user by id
Actions.Description: Returns a user's details such as name, email address, etc.

Actions.Name: Punch user in
Actions.Description: Using this operation, the specified user will be punched in to duty.

Actions.Name: Punch user out
Actions.Description: Using this operation, the specified user will be punched out from duty.
